jobs.title: Bicycle Mechanic
jobs.companyDescription: We are seeking a bicycle mechanic to join our team. The ideal candidate will have experience working in a bicycle environment and be able to perform physical labor for extended periods of time.
jobs.description: We are seeking an experienced and detail-oriented bicycle mechanic to join our team. The ideal candidate will have a strong knowledge of bicycle mechanics and a passion for providing high-quality service to customers.
responsibilities: Perform tune-ups and repairs on bicycles
Assist customers with bike selection and fitting
Maintain an organized and clean work area
Order and maintain inventory of bike parts and accessories
Assist with customer service and sales as needed
qualifications: At least 2 years of experience as a professional bicycle mechanic
In-depth knowledge of bicycle mechanics and repair techniques
Experience working with a variety of bicycle types and brands
Strong attention to detail and commitment to quality
Excellent communication and customer service skills
Ability to work in a fast-paced environment and manage multiple tasks
Familiarity with point-of-sale and inventory management software
benefits: Opportunities for professional development and training
jobs.applicationInstructions: To apply for this position, please send your resume, a cover letter, and any relevant certifications or training to hr@company.com.
